text: <!channel> Re: the inquiries about Open Refine, I am fine with this program being used on the practicum servers.  I've installed it and put a shortcut on the practicum desktop.  Be sure to close the command prompt when you're done using it to free up resources.  Inform your team that even though it runs in a web browser, the server is actually on the practicum server (address 127.0.0.1 points to your practicum server in case you wondered), therefore data is never leaving the practicum server and policies are not being violated

<@U2R2NANUC> we were able to get our data to load in Open Refine but had to allocate 30GB of ram to do so  Seems to be working well, as long as no one else is using system resources. Thanks for your help!
